name: ContextMenu.Sub

disabled.description: Whether or not the submenu is disabled.

open.description: The open state of the submenu.

description: A submenu belonging to the parent context menu. Responsible for managing the state of the submenu.

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: A callback that is fired when the submenu's open state changes.
events.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the submenu's open state changes.

slots.name: subIds
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: 组件中元素的 ID，当您不一定希望提供自定义 ID，但仍希望访问正在分配的 ID（如果有）时，非常有用。
